Article.ArticleTitle: Silver-Catalyzed Chlorocyclization for the Synthesis of 3-Chloro-2H-chromenes.

AbstractText: A silver-catalyzed chlorocyclization reaction of aryl 3-aryl-2-propyn-1-yl ethers in the presence of NCS under darkness was accomplished, which provides a straightforward and efficient access to 3-chloro-2H-chromenes.
